snippet: U.S. lawmakers said Jorge Luis García Pérez, who testified last Thursday on the short-term detention of dissidents, was released Wednesday, four days after he was beaten and arrested by authorities.
lead_paragraph: U.S. lawmakers said Jorge Luis García Pérez, who testified last Thursday on the short-term detention of dissidents, was released Wednesday, four days after he was beaten and arrested by authorities.

headline.main: Cuba: Senators Condemn Treatment of Cuban Dissident
